description:

title: CNN exposes real reason Democrats hate new House Speaker Mike Johnson so much: "He's not the devil"
description:

And I know some of you are thinking, "Wait... the guy who thinks Guam will tip over is the new speaker?" No, you're thinking Rep. Hank Johnson. The Democrat Johnson. Our Johnson is bigger.
